organizationUpdated.title: Organization data for your-organization was updated.
organizationUpdated.description:
Organization data for your-organization was updated:

- Display name was changed from 'Your Organization' to 'new-Your Organization'.

- VatNumber was changed from 'your-vat-number' to 'new-vat-number'.

- Address was changed.

- Contact was changed to 'your-name'.
